Package keystone.api.wrappers

Class Item

java.lang.Object
keystone.api.wrappers.Item
public class Item extends Object
A wrapper for a Minecraft item stack. Contains information about the item, count, and NBT data

      Parameters:

    • damage

      public Item damage(int damage, boolean useUnbreaking, boolean allowBreaking)
      Damage the Item by a given amount
      Parameters:
      damage - The amount of damage to add to the Item
      useUnbreaking - Whether to include the Unbreaking enchantment in the damage calculation
      allowBreaking - If true, then if the item breaks, it will return an empty Item. Otherwise, it will wrap the damage value around
      Returns:
      The modified Item

    • repair

      public Item repair(int damage, boolean wrap)
      Repair the Item by a given amount
      Parameters:
      damage - The amount of damage to remove from the Item
      wrap - If true, then if the item is fully repaired, it will wrap around to fully damaged
      Returns:
      The modified Item

      public net.minecraft.item.ItemStack getMinecraftItem()

      INTERNAL USE ONLY, DO NOT USE IN FILTERS

      Returns:
      The Minecraft item stack
